summary_teim: This is rehearsal footage for the twenty-first induction ceremony featuring Herbie Hancock, Marcus Miller, Buster Williams, Jack DeJohnette, Mike Stern, Wallace Roney, Lynyrd Skynyrd, and  Kid Rock.

abstract_ssm:
This is rehearsal footage of the Rock & Roll Hall of Fame induction ceremony from March 13, 2006. It begins with Herbie Hancock, Marcus Miller, Buster Williams, Jack DeJohnette, Mike Stern, Wallace Roney, and Paul Shaffer rehearsing the Miles Davis medley twice. Lynyrd Skynyrd and Kid Rock then rehearse "Sweet Home Alabama" twice. Skynyrd then rehearse "Free Bird."

Herbie Hancock, Marcus Miller, Buster Williams, Jack DeJohnette, Mike Stern, Wallace Roney, and Paul Shaffer rehearsing the Miles Davis medley -- Herbie Hancock, Marcus Miller, Buster Williams, Jack DeJohnette, Mike Stern, Wallace Roney, and Paul Shaffer rehearsing the Miles Davis medley again -- Lynyrd Skynyrd and Kid Rock then rehearse "Sweet Home Alabama" -- Lynyrd Skynyrd and Kid Rock then rehearse "Sweet Home Alabama" again -- Lynyrd Skynyrd rehearse "Free Bird"
